member.name: T:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.Accents
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Grave=◌̀ Accute=◌́ Circumflex=◌̂ Tilde=◌̃ Macron=◌̄ Overline=◌̅ Breve=◌̆ Dot Above=◌̇ Diaeresis/Umlaut=◌̈ Hook Above=◌̉ Ring Above=◌̊ Double Accute=◌̋ Caron/Háček=◌̌ Double Grave=◌̏ Ogonek=◌̨ Cedilla=◌̧ Tilde Below=◌̰ Macron Below=◌̱ Turned Comma Above=◌̒ Koronis=◌̓.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Voiceless alveolar sibilant affricate=t͡s Voiced alveolar sibilant affricate=d͡z Voiceless palato-alveolar sibilant affricate=t͡ʃ Voiced palato-alveolar sibilant affricate=d͡ʒ Voiceless retroflex sibilant affricate=ʈ͡ʂ Voiced retroflex sibilant affricate=ɖ͡ʐ Voiceless alveolo-palatal sibilant affricate=t͡ɕ Voiced alveolo-palatal sibilant affricate=d͡ʑ Voiceless bilabial post-trilled dental stop=t̪͡ʙ̥ Voiceless bilabial affricate=p͡ɸ Voiced bilabial affricate=b͡β Voiceless labiodental affricate=p̪ [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.HtmlStyle

member.summary:

{0}

{1}
{2} {3} .

member.name: P:LangPad.My.Resources.Resources.PageExportHtml
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>{0}</title> </head> <body> {1} </body> </html>.

member.name: T:LangPad.AppTheme
member.summary: Handles the application's theme.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppTheme.InitThemes
member.summary: Load all of the available themes and apply the user's selected theme, if valid.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppTheme.InitMainFormTheme
member.summary: Add the controls to be themed for the main form.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppTheme.InitRtfEditorFormTheme
member.summary: Add the controls to be themed for the RTF editor.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppTheme.InitDictionaryFormTheme
member.summary: Add the controls to be themed for the dictionary form.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppTheme.InitCharEditTheme
member.summary: Add the controls to be themed for the character editor.

member.name: T:LangPad.AppLoad
member.summary: Load all of the controls in the character editor and check for updates at startup.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppLoad.UpdateSplash(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Update the splash screen.
member.param: The progress text saying what is currently being loaded.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppLoad.LoadApplication
member.summary: Load the application.

member.name: T:LangPad.CharacterInsertion
member.summary: Handles the insertion and deletion of characters in text boxes.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterInsertion.InsertText(System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase,System.String)
member.summary: Insert text into a text box.
member.param: The text box to insert into.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterInsertion.SelectWord(System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase,System.Char,System.Char)
member.summary: Select a string in a textbox between two characters.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterInsertion.InsertBrackets(System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Insert a pair of brackets surrounding the current selection or word.
member.param: The text box to insert into.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterInsertion.RemoveBrackets(System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Remove a set of brackets from the current selection or word.
member.param: The text box to remove the brackets from.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterInsertion.RemoveAllBrackets(System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase)
member.summary: Remove all brackets from the current selection or word.
member.param: The textbox to remove the brackets from.

member.name: T:LangPad.KeyValueConverter
member.summary: Old functions for interpreting values from KeyValue files, to be re-written later.

member.name: M:LangPad.KeyValueConverter.FromCompatibleColor(System.String)
member.summary: Convert from a serialized color to a color object.

member.name: M:LangPad.KeyValueConverter.FromCompatibleFont(System.String)
member.summary: Convert from a serialized font to a font object.

member.name: T:LangPad.Messages
member.summary: Show standard message boxes used throughout LangPad.

member.name: T:LangPad.NotebookController
member.summary: Handles operations on the current notebook used by LangPad.

member.name: F:LangPad.NotebookController.FirstTabUpdate
member.summary: If the first tab has been updated on the main form.

member.name: F:LangPad.NotebookController.UserPageSwitch
member.summary: If the page is currently being switched by the user.

member.name: F:LangPad.NotebookController.MovingPage
member.summary: If the page is in the process of moving.

member.name: P:LangPad.NotebookController.CurrentNotebook
member.summary: The document open in this instance of LangPad.

member.name: P:LangPad.NotebookController.CurrentPageIndex
member.summary: The index of the currently open page in the notebook.

member.name: P:LangPad.NotebookController.PageAreaEnabled
member.summary: If the editing page area should be enabled.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.LoadNotebook
member.summary: Update the UI to reflect the current notebook.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.GoToPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Navigate to page in the notebook.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.RefreshDictionary
member.summary: Refresh the dictionary to reflect the current notebook.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.RefreshFileCharacters
member.summary: Refresh the file characters to reflect the current notebook.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.UpdatePageStats
member.summary: Update all stats for a page.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.UpdateWordCount
member.summary: Updates the UI to reflect the character and word count of the current page.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.UpdateLineNumber
member.summary: Updates the UI to reflect the line number of the current page.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.PageInRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Check if a page is within range of the current notebook's pages.
member.returns: If a page exists at that index.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.NewNotebook
member.summary: Create and load a new notebook with a single page.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.SavePages
member.summary: Save the pages in the current notebook.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.SaveNotebook(System.String)
member.summary: Save the current notebook to a path.
member.param: The path to save the current notebook to.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.InsertPage(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Insert a page to the current notebook.
member.param: The index to place it at.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.ImportPage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Import a file into the notebook at a specific index.
member.param: The index to import the file to.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.RemovePage(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Remove a page at an index. If it's the current page, navigate back one page.
member.param: The index of the page to remove.
If the UI should navigate to the previous page after deletion, if the page deleted was the current page.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.DuplicatePage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Duplicate a page at an index, and optionally change its title. Navigates to new page after duplicating.
member.param: The duplicated page's title, by default the same as the old page

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.RenamePage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Give a page a new title.
member.param: The index of the page to rename.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.MovePage(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move a page from an old index to a new index.
member.param: The index of the page to move.
The index to move the page to.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.MovePageDown(System.Int32)
member.summary: Increment a page's index by 1. If it is already the last page, nothing happens.
member.param: The index of the page to move.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.MovePageUp(System.Int32)
member.summary: Decrement a page's index by 1. If it is already the first page, nothing happens.
member.param: The index of the page to move.

member.name: M:LangPad.NotebookController.CreateNotebookRtb(System.String)
member.summary: Create an ExtendedRichTextBox with the right settings for a LangPad page.

member.name: T:LangPad.AutoUpdater
member.summary: Work with AutoUpdaterDotNET

member.summary: Check for updates and display a dialog if there are any

member.summary: The target form of the character editor.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterEditorToolWindow.SetIcons
member.summary: Update the icons to match the current resolution.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterEditorToolWindow.CharacterEditorToolWindow_FormClosing(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs)
member.summary: Catch closing events to prevent the window from closing automatically when it shouldn't.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterEditorToolWindow.CharacterEditorToolWindow_KeyDown(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)
member.summary: Catch CTRL+S to enable saving on forms besides the main one.

member.name: M:LangPad.CharacterEditorToolWindow.Reshow
member.summary: If visible, hide and show again.

member.name: T:LangPad.HtmlConverter
member.summary: Handles conversion to HTML.

member.name: M:LangPad.HtmlConverter.RtfToHtml(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convert RTF to HTML.
member.param: The title, if not only body.
If only the contents inside the body tag of the HTML document should be returned.
member.returns: The RTF that has been converted to HTML.

member.name: T:LangPad.ImageResizer
member.summary: Module handling the resizing of images.

member.name: M:LangPad.ImageResizer.ResizeImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Size,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Resize an image to a new size, with or without preserving its aspect ratio. Does not modify the original image.
member.param: If the aspect ratio of the source image should be preserved.
member.returns: A copy of the source image, resized to the new size.

member.name: M:LangPad.ImageResizer.HeightAfterWidthAdjust(System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.Size,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the height value of a rectangle after adjusting its width.
member.param: If the aspect ratio should be preserved
member.returns: The height value of the new rectangle.

member.name: M:LangPad.ImageResizer.WidthAfterHeightAdjust(System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.Size,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get the width value of a rectangle after adjusting its height.
member.param: If the aspect ratio should be preserved
member.returns: The width value of the new rectangle.

member.name: M:LangPad.DictionaryForm.UpdateDisplayFont
member.summary: Update the display font (the font the table renders in)

member.name: M:LangPad.DictionaryForm.SaveDictionary
member.summary: Save the table's current state into the current dictionary

member.name: M:LangPad.DictionaryForm.DictionaryGrid_EditingControlShowing(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs)
member.summary: Change the target textbox of the character editor to be the current cell of the table.

member.name: M:LangPad.DictionaryForm.DictionaryGrid_RowPostPaint(System.Object,System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventArgs)
member.summary: Draw row numbers on the table.

member.name: T:LangPad.RtfEditorForm
member.summary:
A form that shows the raw RTF data of the current page open in the main window.
The RTF can be edited manually and when the refresh button is clicked, it will update the RTF data of the current page on the main window.

member.name: T:LangPad.AppInstance
member.summary: Contains information about the current instance of the application.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppInstance.CharEditWindow
member.summary: The character editor tools window used between windows.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppInstance.SmartReplaceList
member.summary: A list of accent+base character combinations to replace with a single character.

member.name: F:LangPad.AppInstance.ApplicationTheme
member.summary: The theme of the application's interface.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetIconResolution
member.summary: Get the icon resolution set by the user.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetCurrentVersion
member.summary: Get the current version of the application.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetVersionString
member.summary: Get the application version, formatted as a string.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GetAppDisplayName
member.summary: Get the application name, plus its version number as a string.
member.returns: The display name used throughout the application.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GoToPatreon
member.summary: Opens the Patreon link.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GoToGitHub
member.summary: Opens the GitHub link.

member.name: M:LangPad.AppInstance.GoToWebsite
member.summary: Opens the website link.

member.name: T:LangPad.Util
member.summary: Module containing various utility methods.

member.name: M:LangPad.Util.MoveItem``1(System.Collections.IList,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Move an item of type T in a list from and old index to a new index.
member.typeparam: The type of item in the list.

member.name: M:LangPad.Util.WordCount(System.String)
member.summary: Get the number of words in a text.

member.name: M:LangPad.Util.BeginOperation(System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary:
Signal to the user that an operation is being processed.
The form that is the target of the operation.

member.name: M:LangPad.Util.EndOperation(System.Windows.Forms.Form)
member.summary:
Signal to the user that an operation has completed.
The form that is the target of the operation.
